data.persona: The humans walking around. I am one of them. A head, 2 arms, and two legs. No tail!
data.description:
You are in the The Choir room.
It is a room with a table in the middle with chairs around it.  There is a closet that contains Choir robes that are long white and green accents.  There is a small keyboard in the corner.
There's a room here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the room so that I can save it for the rest of the choir before another group gets it.
data.mid_motivation: I will practice singing in the choir for our next performance.
data.long_motivation: I will be part of a famous Choir who will be known for their talents and performs for the nobility and the churches.
